title: Jury Selection To Begin In 2012 Aurora Theater Mass Shooting
teaser: Jury selection for the trial of the accused Aurora theater shooter begins Tuesday in Colorado. The death penalty case took two and a half years to come to this moment. James Holmes's legal team admits that he was the shooter that killed 12 people. But the question is whether Holmes was legally insane at the time of the 2012 massacre.
